name: Date.FormatStyle.TimeStyle
desc: Type that defines time styles varied in length or components included.

items.name: static let complete: Date.FormatStyle.TimeStyle
items.desc: A time style with all components represented.

items.name: static let omitted: Date.FormatStyle.TimeStyle
items.desc: A time style with no time-related components represented.

items.name: static let shortened: Date.FormatStyle.TimeStyle
items.desc: A shortened time style with only the hour, minute, and day period components represented.

items.name: static let standard: Date.FormatStyle.TimeStyle
items.desc: A time style with all components except the time zone represented.

items.name: init(from: Decoder)
items.desc: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

items.name: func encode(to: Encoder)
items.desc: Encodes the value into the given encoder.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value of the style format.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.name: static func != (Date.FormatStyle.TimeStyle, Date.FormatStyle.TimeStyle) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are not equal.

items.name: static func == (Date.FormatStyle.TimeStyle, Date.FormatStyle.TimeStyle) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are equal.
